programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Liam and his dog Vader bring down a fleeing suspect, while Kev and Spike rescue a man trapped in an overturned car after a spectacular crash. Pete is forced to pull out his Taser when arresting a violent offender.(n)

programme.title: Murdered By My Daughter
programme.desc: Documentary examining the events surrounding the murders in April 2016 of Elizabeth and Katie Edwards by 14-year-olds Kim Edwards and Lucas Markham, Britain's youngest double killers. The officer in charge of the case gives an insight into the investigation, including the recording of the interview in which Kim explaining why she killed her mother and sister, and one in which her boyfriend detailed his involvement in the crime.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal has the latest developments and invites his studio audience and celebrity guests to discuss how the Big Brother housemates are getting on.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Botched Up Bodies
programme.desc: After a breast operation, reality TV star Natalee Harris was unhappy with the size, shape and symmetry - and to make matters worse, it left her suffering constant back pain. Now she visits a surgeon to see if he can give her a new more perky pair. The film also meets former page three model Tracy Kirby, who was left scarred both physically and emotionally by an unsuccessful facelift, and 21-year-old Katie Price wannabe Nathan Thursfield, who has spent £40,000 to look like his idol. Plus, a comparison of actor John Travolta as he looked in his 20s with how he appears now as a 62-year-old movie veteran.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Gotham
programme.desc: Cobblepot turns up at Gordon's apartment and passes on information that Maroni and Falcone are at war about development plans for the Arkham district. The detective and Bullock are assigned to the case of a murdered councillor and his aide, and when another politician is found burned alive at the asylum, Gordon deduces that the gangsters are trying to sway the vote in their preferred directions. However, Ed Nygma's research reveals the same peculiar murder weapon was used for all of the killings. Crime thriller, starring Ben McKenzie.(n)

programme.title: Inside Britain's Biggest Mosque
programme.desc: Meera Syal narrates a documentary going behind the scenes at the Baitul Futuh mosque in Morden, south London, home to Britain's 30,000-strong Ahmadi Muslim community. The film reveals the defining moments of life at the mosque, from finding love to committing to faith as well as looking at international celebrations and a tragedy that devastates the entire community.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice offers advice to the owners of a three-bedroom detached house in Cheltenham, Gloucestershire, suggesting a complete overhaul to ensure potential buyers get a good first impression by keeping things simple and adding tasteful antique furniture.(n)

programme.title: House Busters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis invites three experts to `heal' a house that is making its inhabitants unhappy. The team diagnoses a troubled house belonging to a middle-aged couple in Watford.(n)

programme.desc: Building work disturbs a fox's earth, leaving the cubs orphaned, and a duck family is taken to a new home.(n)

programme.desc: Mr Rude buys a new toothbrush, Mr Grumpy's house is invaded by Miss Sunshine and her friends, and Miss Whoops tries to clean Mr Quiet's teeth.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: The Mice children send a letter to Mofy telling her that their mother is not feeling very well and they would like the rabbit to visit to cheer her up.(n)

programme.desc: Mummy Pig does a parachute jump for charity, which means Daddy Pig has to conquer his fear of heights.(n)

programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.(n)

programme.desc: Holly and her parents try to impress Snobby King and Queen Marigold with help from the elf band.(n)

programme.desc: Young Koala wishes he could keep up with the young Joey the kangaroo when they play tag.(n)

programme.desc: Wanda and her extra-terrestrial pal befriend a spider named Jack, who spins them a trampoline and a new set of curtains.(n)

programme.desc: Matthew Wright and guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.desc: Tracy Metro sets out to spruce up the tired interior of a picturesque former pump house in the Peak District, which is causing a financial blockage for retired vicar John.(n)

programme.desc: Kat identifies Brody as the pawn shop vandal and arrests him, but Scarlett seems reluctant to testify against him. Justin discovers Brody has been taking drugs and throws him out.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Finn is paralysed after a major stroke, but still manages to cause trouble by claiming to have no memory of his confession, forcing Xanthe to testify in court.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Deeks is rushed to hospital after being shot during a robbery at a convenience store, leaving Callen and Sam to hunt the culprits. Discovering the gunmen were gang members for hire, Callen goes undercover to find out more, while Deeks realises he may have been used as bait as part of a bigger plan.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Justice
programme.desc: A woman shopping in a convenience store witnesses a robbery in which the owner was killed and her niece seriously injured, ending up a paraplegic. The shopper, Karen, believes she recognises one of the robbers, but he is released thanks to a false alibi. Tortured by the memories of the murder of her brother - a crime that was never solved - Karen embarks on a trail of revenge against the perpetrators. Drama, starring Cynthia Watros. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Finn is paralysed after a major stroke, but still manages to cause trouble by claiming to have no memory of his confession, forcing Xanthe to testify in court.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Kat identifies Brody as the pawn shop vandal and arrests him, but Scarlett seems reluctant to testify against him. Justin discovers Brody has been taking drugs and throws him out.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: For years, London's East End was denied a new bridge because of the need to guarantee passage of ships up and down the Thames. For years, the greatest engineers of the age hunted for a design that would keep both road and water traffic moving. As Rob Bell explains, the solution came from architect Horace Jones, whose revolutionary design, with its thousand-tonne opening sections, was powered by nothing more than water. Rob also explains the bridge was lucky to survive the Second World War, having been a target for German V-1 flying bombs.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers with Alan Davies
programme.desc: As the strand returns, RSPCA officer Anthony helps Timmy, a neglected elderly collie cross who is found in a house surrounded by his own mess with a huge tumour on his face. Meanwhile, Inspector Helen meets Archie, a stroppy shih-tzu whose fur is so matted he can barely see or hear.(n)

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi returns to help a couple with their beach-front business in the Merseyside resort of Southport. John and Mel opened a craft ale bar and started renovating the flats above it into a hostelry despite having no experience. With the residence more of a building site than a boutique hotel, Alex has to get stuck in as the first guests are due in a matter of weeks.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal has the latest developments and invites his studio audience and celebrity guests to discuss how the Big Brother housemates are getting on.(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: Doomsday comes to LA in this gripping tale of terror, panic and paranoia. When dirty bombs are detonated over Southern California, a husband (Rory Cochrane) and his wife (Mary McCormack) become quarantined, he inside their house, she outside. As contaminated ash rains down from the sky, chaos reigns across the area as those left out in the open run the risk of being poisoned by the fatal toxins. The film is the directorial debut of production designer Chris Gorak, who also wrote the script(n)

programme.title: Love and a Bullet
programme.desc: Gun-blazing action and satirical wit nicely blend together in this urban crime drama. Rapper-actor Treach (of the group Naughty by Nature) plays Malik Bishop, a street gangsta who has become a hip and elite hit man. Bishop is hired to slay his boss's innocent girlfriend, but he begins to ruminate on his shady lifestyle when he falls in love with his target. Kent Masters King, Freez Luv(n)

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone stars as a cop named Marion Cobretti -- Cobra for short -- in this action-thriller whose mile-a-minute pacing, dash of humor, and impressive stunts will entertain the most demanding fans. His partner is Gonzales (Reni Santoni) and both work for a special unit that is called in when ordinary methods fail. Cobra and Gonzales are assigned to track down a serial killer and at the same time protect Ingrid (Brigitte Nielsen), who seems a likely bet to become victim number 17. The action heats up when they discover that the "one" serial killer is really a whole gang of neo-Nazi locos(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as Nathaniel Ayers in Oscar-nominated director Joe Wright's poignant look at a former violin prodigy whose bouts with schizophrenia landed him on the streets after two years of schooling at Juilliard. Steve Lopez is a disenchanted journalist. He's wandering through Los Angeles' Skid Row when he spots Ayers, whose promising career in music was cut short due to acute mental illness. The more Steve learns about Ayers, the more he longs to help the troubled soul(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Based on a true event, the film follows the 2010 mining disaster incident where a group of thirty-three miners were trapped inside the San Jose mine in Chile for more than two months after a gold and copper mine collapses(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their maze trials after narrowly escaping the first test in this young-adult dystopian sequel(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul (Ethan Hawke), headed to Mexico with his faithful collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang of misfits and finds himself exiled by the town marshal (John Travolta), which sparks a bloody quest for revenge. Karen Gillan and Taissa Farmiga co-star. Ti West wrote and directed this Western thriller(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood makes a second outing in the role that established him as one of Hollywood's top stars. 'Dirty' Harry Callaghan is assigned to look into a series of murders of the city's unpunished criminals(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Lone Survivor director Peter Berg helmed this docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion in the Gulf of Mexico that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that Mike Williams (Mark Wahlberg) and the rest of the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival. Kate Hudson, Kurt Russell, and John Malkovich co-star(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: After walking in on his girlfriend cheating, lawyer Mitch sets up home near the local college. It's just the chance his thirtysomething pals have been waiting for: they turn his new house into a 24-hour party house. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, decide to throw one last party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going awry in this raunchy and ridiculous comedy(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: Hit comedy set on an American college campus in the early 60s, focusing on the outrageous escapades of the Delta fraternity - a house full of beer-swilling party animals. The college dean wants them out and enlists the help of snobbish students from a rival fraternity, leaving the Deltas to use all their wit, cunning and downright deviousness to avoid being thrown off campus(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Former LA cop Brian now makes his living driving in illegal street races in Miami. Squeezed by the FBI, he agrees to set up druglord Verone for a king-sized bust(n)

programme.title: Maximum Overdrive
programme.desc: The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. A group of people find shelter in a relay station and are surrounded by a horde of raging trucks. After a tremendous fight. Bill, Bubba, Brett and some others manage to reach the coast and set sail to an island void of technology(n)

programme.title: Doctor Detroit
programme.desc: After a night of partying, Clifford, a timid professor, is duped into posing as a flamboyant pimp. Balancing his educator life and street life, Clifford must manage four prostitutes and save them from an intimidating mob boss named Mom(n)

programme.title: Consenting Adults
programme.desc: A wealthy couple befriend their new neighbours, but do the newcomers have ulterior motives for their friendship?(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: When hippie-esque psycho Scorpio goes on a killing spree, Inspector Harry Callahan and new partner Chico are assigned to hunt him down, but not before the Mayor and Lt. Bressler admonish Callahan about his heavy-handed tactics(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Office worker Wesley learns not only that his dad was a lethal hitman, but also that he's inherited the same skills(n)

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Stephen Glass is a staff writer for the respected - current events and policy magazine - The New Republic, and a freelance feature writer for Rolling Stone Magazine and others. By the mid-90s, Glass' articles had turned him into one of the most sought-after young journalists in Washington D.C., but a bizarre chain of events suddenly stopped his careers path. Nominated for four Independent Spirit Awards and a Golden Globe(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Hamlet 2
programme.desc: A failed actor turned drama teacher attempts to make a splash by staging a controversial sequel to William Shakespeare's Hamlet(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: As the end of the first Gulf War nears, a group of adventurous American soldiers attempt to find a huge cache of hidden Iraqi gold(n)

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: In a 1950s-era alternate universe where domesticated zombies play a functional role in society by delivering the milk, carrying the mail, and even helping out with household chores, one boy is about to find out just how big of a personal responsibility "pet" ownership truly is. When the Earth passed through a cloud of space dust and the dead arose from their graves to devour the flesh of the living, it first seemed that all hope for humanity was lost. Society's rapid slide into chaos, however, was soon halted when scientists at a company called ZomCom created a special collar that turned the rampaging animated corpses docile. Now, thanks to ZomCom, everything is under control -- or is it? Timmy Robinson (K'Sun Ray) isn't quite convinced. Quiet and withdrawn, the skeptical young boy spends so much time locked away in his room that he's almost become invisible around the household. His mother Helen (Carrie-Anne Moss) has recently purchased a zombie to help keep things tidy around the house though, and when the creature attempts to engage the curious youngster in a game of catch, a friendship is forged between boy and zombie that finds the amiable gut-muncher nicknamed Fido (Billy Connolly) practically becoming a part of the family. Things take a turn for the worse however, when Fido's collar malfunctions and Timmy's neighbors begin dying in droves. When ZomCom's top zombie control specialist Mr. Bottoms (Henry Czerny) moves in across the street from Timmy, the increasingly complicated situation threatens to place a serious stumbling block in the path of human-zombie relations(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Ted (voice of Seth MacFarlane) ties the knot with Tami-Lynn (Jessica Barth), and recruits his best friend John (Mark Wahlberg) as a sperm donor in order to start a family in this sequel to the comedy hit about a teddy bear come to life. Later, when the Commonwealth of Massachusetts demands that Ted appear before a judge to prove he's a real person, the frisky bear and his pal vow to fight for their civil rights. Morgan Freeman and Amanda Seyfried co-star(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Charming biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to create the Miracle Mop. The success of that product leads to a home-shopping empire and her ascension to matriarch of her family(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: In this offbeat love story, a woman falls for an oddly principled hit man who kills anyone who hires him to commit murder. While she believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent who's hunting her new beau(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A raunchy yet heartfelt comedy from director Judd Apatow about Amy (Amy Schumer), a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City, who must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door

The Rhea-M comet starts revolving round earth and provokes all machinery to become their own masters and revolt against mankind. Bill, Bubba, Brett and some others manage to reach the coast and set sail to an island void of technology(n)

Nominated for four Independent Spirit Awards and a Golden Globe(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Set in the Depression of the '30s in southern United States, this drama portrays the remarkable relationship established between Paul Edgecomb (Tom Hanks), a prison guard on Death Row, and John Coffey (Michael Clarke Duncan), a hefty colored man sentenced to death for a brutal double homicide. As the days go by, and after some surprising experiences, Edgecomb begins to have doubts about Coffey's culpability. He is a naïve, apprehensive man with a supernatural gift. Based on a novel by Stephen King, this drama received four Oscar nominations(n)

programme.title: Hamlet 2

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: In a 1950s-era alternate universe where domesticated zombies play a functional role in society by delivering the milk, carrying the mail, and even helping out with household chores, one boy is about to find out just how big of a personal responsibility "pet" ownership truly is. When the Earth passed through a cloud of space dust and the dead arose from their graves to devour the flesh of the living, it first seemed that all hope for humanity was lost. Society's rapid slide into chaos, however, was soon halted when scientists at a company called ZomCom created a special collar that turned the rampaging animated corpses docile. Now, thanks to ZomCom, everything is under control -- or is it? Timmy Robinson (K'Sun Ray) isn't quite convinced. Quiet and withdrawn, the skeptical young boy spends so much time locked away in his room that he's almost become invisible around the household. His mother Helen (Carrie-Anne Moss) has recently purchased a zombie to help keep things tidy around the house though, and when the creature attempts to engage the curious youngster in a game of catch, a friendship is forged between boy and zombie that finds the amiable gut-muncher nicknamed Fido (Billy Connolly) practically becoming a part of the family. Things take a turn for the worse however, when Fido's collar malfunctions and Timmy's neighbors begin dying in droves. When ZomCom's top zombie control specialist Mr. Bottoms (Henry Czerny) moves in across the street from Timmy, the increasingly complicated situation threatens to place a serious stumbling block in the path of human-zombie relations(n)

programme.title: Ted 2

Later, when the Commonwealth of Massachusetts demands that Ted appear before a judge to prove he's a real person, the frisky bear and his pal vow to fight for their civil rights. programme.title: Great Expectations

Wemmick warns him that rumours of Magwitch's return from Australia are rife, so he decides to help the convict evade recapture. Starring Douglas Booth, Ray Winstone, Vanessa Kirby and Gillian Anderson.(n)

programme.title: Pie in the Sky
programme.desc: Armed raiders rob wealthy guests at the restaurant, leaving Crabbe no option but to shut up shop. Starring Richard Griffiths and Samantha Janus.(n)

programme.title: Monarch of the Glen
programme.desc: Archie organises a magnificent midsummer ball, hoping the event will make it clear to his peers that he has regained full control of the estate before Stella departs. However, she is less than keen to leave and plots to sabotage the entire event. With all the bank's top brass in attendance, Archie's future hangs in the balance. Drama, starring Alastair Mackenzie.(n)

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Leon responds to a call from a distraught mother whose 18-month-old child has sustained serious head injuries. She claims the toddler fell from her highchair, but suspicion mounts that the mother's partner may have contravened his restraining order to visit the family. Tony Stamp spends his last shift with Sun Hill comforting the woman, and is shocked when he has to arrest her for harming her own daughter.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Grace is summoned to a Soho brothel, where a woman is holding a man at knifepoint, claiming he knows the whereabouts of her 16-year-old sister, who has been missing for six months. Revisiting the familiar case, the detective feels guilty she did not do more to help the family earlier. When a body is found, she follows a lead to the missing girl's old teacher, who had acted as her support buddy when she turned to prostitution to pay for her heroin habit, and nearly loses control when she is overcome by anger in the interrogation room. Ian Kelsey guest stars.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The discovery of a Roman sword with traces of blood on it is linked to an unidentified, headless corpse found near Heathrow in March 2008. It leads the team members to a lock-up belonging to a bodybuilder called Mark Rix, who died of a suspected heart attack the same year, so they start looking for connections between the original murder and Rix's death. They are helped in their investigation by anthropologist Fiona Kennedy, for whom Dan begins to develop feelings - just as he is told his wife might be discharged from the secure hospital where she has spent the past several years. Tracy-Ann Obermann and Liz White guest star.(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Richard is struck down with a tropical disease and Camille is in Paris, so when a diver's body is found in shallow waters, with peculiar markings on his chest, Dwayne and Fidel have to solve this tricky case themselves. To add to their problems, a holidaying British cop pokes her nose in - and she is even more annoying than the out-of-sorts DI. Caribbean crime drama, starring Danny John-Jules, Gary Carr and Ben Miller, with guest appearances from Shirley Henderson and Lisa Faulkner.(n)

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. The team attends a triple murder at a farmhouse, where the investigating detective, Supt Tom Byrne, wastes no time making his presence felt. The pathologists soon make a breakthrough when DNA found at the scene matches that of a mysterious female serial killer - although Nikki has cause to question the direction they are heading in. The case is proving difficult for Leo, however, whose mind is in turmoil following the suicide of an old friend. Guest starring Vincent Regan and Shelley Conn.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part one of two. Ted invites his old university professor, who told him he would never make it as an architect, to the grand opening of the GNB building. However, when the academic snubs him saying he does not know who he is, Ted goes back to the campus to confront him, taking the gang along for the ride. While there, Lily and Marshall run into an old acquaintance they would rather have avoided. Guest starring Seth Green and Peter Gallagher.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: With Jess away on jury duty, Nick rents out the loft to help pay for Schmidt's stag night. Winston suspects KC is cheating on him, so asks CeCe to help him find proof. Comedy, starring Jake Johnson and Max Greenfield.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: A new new girl enters the gang's life when a beautiful pharmaceutical rep sub-lets Jess's room while she is on jury duty - and she quickly makes an impression. Megan Fox guests.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta takes part in an undercover FBI operation that ends in a mass arrest. But when one of the mobsters escapes he enlists Boyle's help in tracking him down. Captain Holt tests the squad's patience with practice drills in which Sgt Jeffords plays different roles, while Gina pleads with Boyle to keep a secret. US cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Captain Holt is taken by surprise when his long-time nemesis, Deputy Chief Madeline Wuntch (guest star Kyra Sedgwick), arrives to carry out an inspection of his precinct. Peralta and Jeffords test the boundaries between `work friendship' and `real friendship' while they investigate a stabbing at a trendy milk bar. Boyle searches for a guest to take to his ex-wife's engagement party - will Diaz come to the rescue?.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends try to solve the mystery of Sheldon's post-lunch activities, following him to a secret room where they discover how he chills out. Elsewhere, Leonard is jealous when Penny starts texting a classmate, but things quickly change when Alex gets flirty with him.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon feels undermined when his parking space at the university is allocated to Howard instead, and his determination to cling on to the spot causes a rift in the pair's friendship. However, the battle between the boys pales in comparison to that waged by Amy and Bernadette, whose disagreement on behalf of their significant others becomes increasingly personal. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons and Simon Helberg.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: The Captain asks Lily to move to Rome for a year so she can continue to act as his consultant while he lives there, but she is afraid Marshall will feel resentful toward her if she accepts. Meanwhile, Ted and Barney are captivated by the idea of seeing a woman's figure as it is always hidden beneath a large coat. American sitcom, guest starring Kyle MacLachlan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin tries to find her `something old', which she buried in Central Park years previously in preparation for her potential future wedding. Meanwhile, Marshall and Lily ask Ted to help them pack for their trip to Italy, and Barney bonds with Robin's father.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess invents a male alter ego to help her buy a new car from a sexist salesman, but her plan backfires. Schmidt and Cece worry when Winston decides to bring his prankster girlfriend Rhonda along to their wedding. Sonequa Martin-Gree (The Walking Dead) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Schmidt suffers an emasculating experience in front of Cece, so he insists on taking a manly road trip to Las Vegas for his bachelor party weekend with the guys. However, an incident at a biker bar in the desert puts Schmidt's new-found bravado to the test.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max and Caroline discover that one of their regular customers at the diner is actually a successful photographer who has been keeping a secret. Meanwhile, Sophie believes Oleg could be cheating on her when she finds out he has two mobile phones. Comedy, guest starring Valerie Harper, with Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Sophie's wedding shower is interrupted when there is a hostage crisis. Meanwhile, Max and Caroline's cupcake business gets unwanted publicity after someone gets arrested while sporting one of their company's T-shirts. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While the girls go to Disneyland and get made up as princesses, the guys have to promote science as a career option for women at Howard's old middle school. Meanwhile, Raj and Lucy have their first date in a library, where instead of speaking to each other they send text messages.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette and Howard host a dinner party, but as it falls on Sheldon's Thai food night, he opts to bring his own dinner. As punishment for his lack of manners, the gang decides he should organise Wolowitz's cluttered wardrobe, but he discovers an unopened letter from Howard's father, who hasn't made contact in years.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: A new face arrives in Hollyoaks village, while Hunter turns to Lily for help, and Yasmine tricks Kim. Elsewhere, Shane manipulates Cleo to withdraw Goldie's saving account after stealing her bank card.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt sent to find and destroy the only sample of a deadly man-made virus. However, he faces tough opposition in a former spy-turned-criminal mastermind who has already acquired the cure and now wants the pathogen itself. Director John Woo's action thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton and Anthony Hopkins.(n)

programme.title: Vlogglebox
programme.desc: Featuring reactions to Miley Cyrus busking in disguise, Nasa Live - Earth from Space and David Beckham and James Corden auditioning to be the next James Bond.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny's TV breaks down, so she heads to the boys' flat to watch her favourite shows. However, Sheldon tires of her presence and bans future visits, leading to an embarrassing form of retaliation. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj search for the America's Next Top Model house.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A smitten Howard becomes convinced he has met his soulmate in the form of surgeon Stephanie Barnett, but he fails to realise she is far more interested in Leonard. Less Than Perfect's Sara Rue guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. Under scrutiny are period drama Downton Abbey, factual documentary Countdown to Life, exotic recordings Singing in the Rainforest, insight into white supremacy Inside the Ku Klux Klan, horror film The Woman in Black, and the David Cameron `PigGate' scandal on Newsnight. Narrated by Caroline Aherne. First shown in September 2015.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane presents a countdown of the 50 greatest sporting clips on the internet, featuring a selection of amusing videos including footage of flying press-ups, a bikini wax race and arguably one of the world's best tackles.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Teacher and self-confessed cougar Marie returns to the restaurant for a date with 32-year-old lighting technician Adrian, while sports enthusiast Stephanie is matched with former rugby player Stuart. Plus, 71-year-old Janet and 87-year-old former soldier George bond over their shared love of travel and even joke about jetting off to Venezuela together.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. Under scrutiny are period drama Downton Abbey, factual documentary Countdown to Life, exotic recordings Singing in the Rainforest, insight into white supremacy Inside the Ku Klux Klan, horror film The Woman in Black, and the David Cameron `PigGate' scandal on Newsnight. Narrated by Caroline Aherne. First shown in September 2015.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam tries to be a horror writer, but his efforts get him grounded on Halloween when Beverly discovers that she is the basis for the monster in his story.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake and Rosa are framed for a crime they did not commit, leaving the rest of the team to find out what really happened and save their colleagues from jail. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: The gang try to talk Jess out of celebrating Christmas this year, so she suggests a compromise by organising a Secret Santa gift exchange.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Russell is forced to move into Timmy's apartment after his mother cuts him off, but begins to make friends with his new neighbours. Audrey offers to flirt with Jeff's boss to increase his chances of earning a bonus, and Adam tries to get Jen to dress more glamorously in bed.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff asks his colleagues to sponsor Audrey in a 10k charity run, but struggles to raise funds having previously refused their own appeals for donations. Meanwhile, Russell is disturbed when a potential love-interest seems to be using a set of strangely familiar tactics to get rid of him.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Hunter is devastated by Neeta's decision, while Prince returns and Lily breaks down in his arms. Elsewhere, Cleo begs Shane to keep quiet, and the Cunninghams look for a lodger.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The tourists visit a snail farm in Perpignan, southern France, where Brendan Sheerin demonstrates an unusual beauty treatment. Meanwhile, one of the passengers becomes a hero during a dramatic banana boat ride, and there is a surprise departure before the votes are even cast.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea LA
programme.desc: Spin-off from the reality show in which the gang heads out to Los Angeles for the summer. Jamie meets glamorous Naz and is immediately smitten, while Binky tries to put her feelings for JP behind her, but finds it difficult to deal with the female attention he's getting in LA.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: After taking a job as a hostess at a restaurant, Audrey has to pretend she still works at the magazine when an old friend asks her for a favour. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Russell adjust to life without his trust fund, and Adam discovers Jen finds him too talkative.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey joins Jeff at his company Christmas party, where they compete to see who is funnier. Elsewhere, the friends struggle to understand Russell's efforts to make everyone miserable until he makes a confession about his childhood. David Spade stars.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Lennox's boyfriend begins to feel neglected when she spends time on her new blog instead of with him. Meanwhile, Joe sets Mel up on a blind date, and in exchange he wants to take out her attractive friend Ariel. Comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: A friend of Mel's decides she wants to have a baby, and believes Joe is the most suitable person to father her child. Meanwhile, Lennox and Haskell disagree over what to do with a rare book when they discover its value. Comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Riley makes a bet with Ben that he cannot get a second date with Heather, but when she fails to jump at the chance to go out with him again, Ben resorts to desperate measures to win the wager. Bonnie meets a handsome stranger and considers ending her relationship with Brad. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau and Chelsea Kane.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Tucker acts like a lawyer in front of his father because he has forgotten to tell him he has dropped out of law school and works in TV. Meanwhile, Riley has a crush on a British guy, but Bonnie mistakenly thinks she has fallen for Danny. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part two of two. Barney confides in Ted that he plans to propose to Patrice and swears him to secrecy, but Ted feels he should tell Robin what is happening, and asks her to be his date to the gala opening of the GNB building. Meanwhile, Marshall and Lily enjoy their first night away together since the birth of Marvin and intend to savour every moment, but end up feeling anxious about their son.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin learns that Barney failed to ask her father's permission before proposing, so she forces him to get Robin Sr's approval as soon as possible. However, when she discovers that he has got married without telling her, she changes her mind. Meanwhile, Ted hides his disappointment at his friends' engagement by helping plan their wedding.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: When Nick's attraction to Reagan starts affecting Schmidt and Cece's relationship, they enact a plan to demystify her, in hopes of helping Nick get over her. Meanwhile, Winston teaches Reagan the art of the break-up. Megan Fox stars.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Reagan causes chaos between Nick and Winston when she tells them she'll sleep with just one of them in an attempt to challenge the guys' indecisiveness. Meanwhile, Schmidt is reunited with his college frenemy, Benjamin, when looking at wedding venues with Cece.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The squad has time to kill when the arrival of the Serbian president's motorcade to Brooklyn is delayed, so Peralta launches the seventh annual Jimmy Jab Games, an eccentric series of races and contests held in the precinct building. Meanwhile, Jeffords and Holt must set up a new drug task force approved by Holt's nemesis, Madeline Wuntch.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: It's Halloween again, and this time Peralta bets Holt he can steal his treasured watch before midnight, enlisting criminal assistance to achieve his goal. Elsewhere, Gina struggles to keep up with her college course, perform a full-time job and attend dance rehearsals - leading to problems both in and out of work.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: As part of the relationship agreement, Sheldon reluctantly has to take care of Amy when she gets sick, but she loves the extra attention so much she pretends to remain in poor health. Elsewhere, Howard tries to get some tips on manliness from Penny when he and Bernadette go to visit her father.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tries to get Sheldon into the Christmas mood by playing a game, but things do not go as planned when Sheldon reveals a childhood trauma. Raj goes out with the girls and reveals he had crushes on both Penny and Bernadette - but not Amy. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: With their wedding looming, Robin and Barney try to relax at a restaurant, but plot revenge on a couple who ruin their evening. Ted invites Lily to see the house he has been renovating in the suburbs and shares his plans of moving to Chicago after the ceremony. Meanwhile, Marshall takes Marvin on a last-minute trip to Minnesota to see his family before leaving for Rome.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: The gang travels to Long Island to attend Robin and Barney's wedding, but the couple make a startling discovery about their families en route. Meanwhile on his way back from Minnesota, Marshall realises his mother has posted a picture online declaring he has accepted his dream job before consulting his wife, and Lily realises that Ted hasn't dealt with his feelings for Robin. Comedy, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: The wedding is looming, but Jess is still doing the alterations on Cece's dress. Schmidt gets into trouble with his colleagues when he plans his nuptials instead of doing his work. Nick struggles with the task of asking Reagan to be his `plus one' to the wedding. Winston and Aly try to keep things under wraps at the precinct.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sam introduces Jess to his female best friend, Diane. Nick worries that Schmidt's father Gavin will let his son down and leave him disappointed again. Winston is offended by Sam's reaction to the birthday gift that he has bought for him. Masters of Sex star Caitlin FitzGerald guests.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Sophie tries her best to locate Max and Caroline's cat Nancy when she disappears. However, she is brought back by businessman Owen (Ian Reed Kesler) after a few days, and her return heralds a big surprise for the girls. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs.(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: Max and Caroline decide they need to bring in a little extra money to help pay off their bank loan, and take second jobs at a high-end Manhattan restaurant. Meanwhile, Han finds an unusual new way to keep tabs on his staff at the diner. Comedy, starring Kat Dennings and Beth Behrs, with guest star Sandra Bernhard.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys compete for a tenured professor position at the university, leading them to try to win over the committee in charge of appointing a new staff member, and arguing about who deserves the spot the most. However, the panel includes Mrs Davis from Human Resources, whom Sheldon has crossed paths with before. Guest starring Regina King.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy tries to help Sheldon get over his desire for closure when one of his favourite TV shows is cancelled on a cliffhanger ending. Meanwhile, Raj discovers his new girlfriend Lucy has a blog in which she has written about him, but is upset when he learns she believes he has feminine qualities, causing him to worry about their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Cindy and Holly have some mother and daughter time, while Louis comforts Simone when she tells him that her mum is dying of Cancer. Elsewhere, Prince has his eyes on the prize, and Kim is feeling lost.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: Recipe for Death II: Kiss the Cook.
programme.desc: Adam makes an action movie, but an unlikely replacement steps in when Barry goes missing for playing the lead. Comedy, starring Sean Giambrone, Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy has a date with a mystery man, so Sheldon asks Howard and Raj to help him find a new girlfriend online. When Amy is coy with the details about the guy she's dating, Penny and Bernadette decide to spy on them. Stephen Merchant guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy spend Thanksgiving together as friends, while Howard reluctantly agrees to volunteer at a soup kitchen with Bernadette, Raj and Emily.(n)

programme.title: Rude Tube
programme.desc: Alex Zane features internet sensation Paige Ginn, one of the best classroom pranks ever, and a scientific discovery made thanks to a joke with a ladder.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Aisling Bea is joined by Alex Brooker and Katherine Ryan, while Rob Beckett teams up with Natalie Cassidy and Tom Allen to discuss the nation's favourite holidays. Jimmy Carr hosts.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is delighted that Leonard has finally managed to find a girlfriend who meets his high standards, but his over-exuberance looks set to cause problems. Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard turns to Penny for advice when his relationship with Stephanie takes off faster than he would have liked, and he realises he is the last person to notice that she has moved in with him. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Shark
programme.desc: Wildlife documentary venturing below the waves to examine the ocean predators' behaviour. The first film reveals their many different hunting methods, from blacktip sharks gathering in huge packs and herding fish into baitballs, to tasselled wobbegongs, which ambush their prey. Other highlights include Greenland sharks, which live under the arctic ice, whitetip reef sharks - arguably the masters of night-time hunting - and the great white, shown stalking fur seals off the coast of South Africa.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Animal Mind
programme.desc: Combining remarkable demonstrations of abilities with revealing photography, Chris Packham travels the world to uncover the secrets of animals' intelligence, emotions and self-awareness. The first episode explores the remarkable ways creatures use their senses, examining how dogs' powerful ability to detect smell creates a bizarre alternative reality for them.(n)

programme.title: Tigers About the House
programme.desc: Documentary following a zookeeper as he rears two Sumatran tiger cubs in his own home, beginning as staff at Australia Zoo in Queensland prepare to receive some new arrivals.(n)

programme.title: Life Story
programme.desc: Naturalist David Attenborough documents the universal tale that unites humanity with every other animal on the planet - the journey through life, and the goal to continue the bloodline through offspring. This edition focuses on the first hurdle any animal will face, surviving infancy. Cameras follow flightless barnacle goose chicks as they strive to find food, leaping 400ft down a cliff from the ledge where they hatched. Meanwhile, in New Zealand, young fur seals have stumbled across a safe haven in which they can learn how to avoid predators, while deep in the Gobi Desert, the long-eared jerboa learns to use its impeccable hearing to catch insect pray. Plus, albatross chicks make their first flight, as threatening tiger sharks wait patiently for them to slip up and land in the sea.(n)

programme.desc: New series. Documentary charting the work of wildlife rangers in Borneo. Rangers wrangle with a giant crocodile, which has taken up residence near a children's playground.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: Presenters Ellie Harrison and Max Hug Williams follow orphaned baby animals as they make steps to return to the wild. Ellie travels to Australia to meet three koalas called Tilly, Puddles and Danny, who were rescued from the roadside where their mother had been killed - Danny needs around-the-clock care and is building up his strength with night-time games of chase. She also meets a tiny wallaby called Neil, whose carer Stella is worried may die from stress if they can't find him a companion. Elsewhere, wildlife cameraman Max is in Costa Rica where he gets acquainted with Newbie, a five-month-old three-toed sloth who has suffered from pneumonia since she was rescued. He follows wildlife manager Sam at Kids Saving the Rainforest as she tries to teach the baby sloth to climb trees and learn to go back to the wild.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: A look at some of the world's strongest creatures.(n)

programme.title: Shark
programme.desc: The documentary series continues, revealing how the creatures are far more than just the hunters they are sometimes perceived as. New discoveries have revealed a hidden side to the shark's character, uncovering how their intricate social lives involve complicated courtship rituals, surprising ways of raising their young, and impressive powers of navigation. Paul McGann narrates.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Animal Mind
programme.desc: Chris Packham continues his exploration of the minds of the cleverest animals on the planet by examining the problem-solving abilities of crows. He also investigates the extraordinary range of animal intelligence, examining bees that navigate, cockatoos that can pick locks and an ingenious octopus.(n)

programme.title: Tigers About the House
programme.desc: Australian zookeeper Giles Clark continues to play mother to tiger cubs Spot and Stripe, who - at nine weeks of age - are going from strength to strength.(n)

programme.title: Life Story
programme.desc: David Attenborough details the transition animals go through as they grow into adults. Looking at examples including a tiger cub whose family is under threat, a vulnerable veined octopus and a pair of sibling cheetahs guarding against starvation, the veteran naturalist illustrates how they develop new skills and learn how to survive on their own.(n)

programme.desc: A local fisherman goes missing, and the rangers are forced to investigate whether his disappears is linked to the presence of a giant crocodile.(n)

programme.title: Nature's Miracle Orphans
programme.desc: In Australia, Ellie Harrison meets Sue, who has been caring for bare-nosed wombat Stacey since her mother was killed four months previously. To get the animal used to the outside world, they take her into they garden for the first time. However, interaction with other wombats is a vital part of rehabilitation, so they need to find a suitable companion before she can be released. Wildlife cameraman Max Hug Williams is in Costa Rica, finding out how three-toed sloth Newbie is responding to treatment and meeting a 10-month-old anteater as he learns to forage the critters he needs to keep him going.(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: An enormous great white shark terrorises a summer resort town, where a police chief, a grizzled fisherman and an intrepid marine biologist realise they're "gonna need a bigger boat" to battle the bloodthirsty beast. An Oscar winner for sound, editing and John Williams's score(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door. A young couple has just moved into their California dream home when they become the target of their next-door neighbour, who disapproves of their relationship. A stern, single father, this tightly wound LAPD officer has appointed himself the watchdog of the neighbourhood. His nightly foot patrols and overly watchful eyes bring comfort to some, but he becomes increasingly aggressive to the newlyweds. These persistent intrusions into their lives cause the couple to fight back(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Child's Play 2
programme.desc: The demonic doll known as Chucky (voice by Brad Dourif) is back to haunt little Andy Barclay (Alex Vincent), now being raised by foster parents (Gerritt Graham, Jenny Agnutter)(n)

programme.title: Johnny Be Good
programme.desc: Courted by all the top colleges, a talented teenage football star must decide which one to attend when he's offered a string of outrageous incentives(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door. programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: While rescuing a US air crew captured by terrorists, a team of Navy SEALs discover that the terrorists possess powerful missiles(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: A young boy who wishes he was big, is shocked to wake up the following morning as a full-grown man(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: A fashion designer is torn between marrying a wealthy New Yorker and going back to her hubby in Alabama. She heads south to finalise her divorce, but the more time she spends with her old flame, the more she feels sparks flying between them again(n)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: Robert Harling adapted and expanded his stage hit set in small-town Louisana celebrating friendship among a group of strong-willed women who discuss their lives, especially the shortcomings of their men, at Truvy's beauty salon(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman returns as forensic psychologist Alex Cross who links up with Secret Service agent Vezzie Flannigan, responsible for the mistake that let brilliant but deadly psychopath kidnap a senator's daughter. As the clock ticks away, the pair realise that this crime is just the beginning in Lee Tamahori's nail-biting adaptation of James Patterson's outstanding thriller(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Oscar-winning rags-to-riches story of a luckless story of a luckless boxer who gets his shot at the big time(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: While rescuing a US air crew captured by terrorists, a team of Navy SEALs discover that the terrorists possess powerful missiles(n)

programme.title: Planet Terror
programme.desc: Director R. Rodriguez pays homage to his favourite B-movies with PLANET TERROR, an old-fashioned zombie film that's infused with enough gore and giggles to please even Peter Jackson. Rose McGowan plays Cherry, a go-go dancer whose night is interrupted by a vicious zombie attack that leaves her missing a leg. Her ex-boyfriend takes charge, fashioning her a new leg from a machine gun and killing zombies along the way(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A handsome and successful bachelor is taken aback when his dream girl asks him to be the maid of honor in her upcoming wedding(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: James Vanderbilt wrote and directed this docudrama about the controversial 60 Minutes exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service that aired just before the 2004 election. Cate Blanchett stars as Mary Mapes, the producer of CBS's newsmagazine series 60 Minutes, which was anchored at the time by the legendary Dan Rather (Robert Redford). Mapes gets a tip from a new source who claims to possess explosive documents proving that Bush received privileged treatment in the National Guard to avoid service in the Vietnam War. After the documents are presented to the American people, a whirlwind of controversy about the their veracity pits Mapes and Rather in a battle for their journalistic lives. Topher Grace, Dennis Quaid, and Elizabeth Moss co-star in this ensemble journalistic thriller(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: An ageing rocker returns home to her estranged family after years on the road following her dreams, and must face the music as she tries to make things right with her loved ones(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: A fire chief and a hotshot American join hands to fight fire-breathing beasts and save mankind(n)

programme.title: Because I Said So
programme.desc: Interfering mum Daphne finds a handsome architect to date her daughter, but Milly wants to choose her own fellas. So she starts seeing another guy on the side. Double-date romcom(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: After suffering a humiliating defeat at the hands of hungry young boxer Clubber Lang, Rocky is rejuvenated by his former rival Apollo Creed, who trains Rocky for a rematch against the fearsome mohawked rival, and helps him regain "the eye of the tiger."(n)

programme.desc: A fire chief and a hotshot American join hands to fight fire-breathing beasts and save mankind(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: After suffering a humiliating defeat at the hands of hungry young boxer Clubber Lang, Rocky is rejuvenated by his former rival Apollo Creed, who trains Rocky for a rematch against the fearsome mohawked rival, and helps him regain "the eye of the tiger."(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal. Revealing how he changed from a once-idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage. Dir: Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon(n)

programme.title: John Ford Goes to War
programme.desc: In this documentary centered on legendary filmmaker John Ford's cinematic contributions to Allied morale during World War II, actor/musician Kris Kristofferson narrates as the How Green Was My Valley director turns his back on Tinseltown in order to fulfill his patriotic duty. By the time the United States became involved in World War II, John Ford was already a film legend, but when Uncle Sam came calling the veteran filmmaker eagerly packed his bags and set his sites on the frontlines. Though Ford did sustain battlefield injuries during the production of the Oscar-winning documentary The Battle of Midway, the remarkable film endeared him to patriotic American audiences across the country and his next wartime effort, 1943's December 7th, proceeded to earn the filmmaker yet another Oscar. In addition to featuring footage from these and other, lesser-known wartime films from Ford, this documentary also offers an intimate look at the complex filmmaker and explores his remarkable legacy through both archive footage and interviews with such notable directors as Oliver Stone and Peter Bogdanovich(n)

programme.title: Warren Miller's Flow State
programme.desc: Skiers test the powder in Alaska, Utah, Switzerland, Japan, Norway and more(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: After his CIA agent twin brother is killed, ticket scalper Chris Rock is thrown into a plot to stop nuclear terror. Anthony Hopkins plays Rock's tough chief. Spy thriller(n)

programme.title: Thick as Thieves
programme.desc: Alec Baldwin (currently shooting The Cat In The Hat) is a cool, sensible career criminal who wants the quiet life, Michael Jai White (star of Tarantino's forthcoming Kill Bill) is the young kid on the block who tries to set him up. Baldwin, forced to retaliate, starts off a war that neither really wants, especially when it starts to attract the attention of the law in Scott Sanders' dramatic crime thriller(n)

programme.title: The Devil's Own
programme.desc: A police officer discovers his refugee house-guest is actually an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding with a gory purpose for going to America(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Night 1. The dawn of the CIA is chronicled via the experiences of three university graduates, including the idealistic Jack McAuliffe, who are recruited as spies and drawn into shadowy Cold War espionage. Jack is mentored by a master spy, and the two set out to unmask a mole within the ranks. Jack also develops an unhealthy attraction to a spy(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Night 2. In the late 1950s, Jack (Chris O'Donnell) journeys to Hungary to assist an uprising against the Soviets. But when the strengthening Soviets fight back, Jack is imprisoned, along with an Englishwoman (Natascha McElhone). Later, Jack becomes entangled in the Bay of Pigs debacle. Meanwhile, an intelligence expert (Michael Keaton) grows overly consumed with unmasking a CIA mole. Executive produced by Tony and Ridley Scott(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Night 3. Angleton (Michael Keaton) pushes ahead to unmask a mole within the CIA ranks, obtaining inside information from a Russian defector. His prime suspect: a high-ranking leader in the CIA. Meanwhile, KGB master spy Starik (Ulrich Thomsen) attempts to launch his final plan to defeat the U.S. Jack: Chris O'Donnell(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: In the plot twisting high-tech thriller Face/Off relentless FBI agent Sean Archer must go dangerously undercover to investigate the location of a lethal biological weapon planted by his arch rival, the sadistic terrorist for hire Castor Troy. After undergoing a radical surgical procedure, Archer literally 'borrows' Troy's face and identity to carry out his mission. But things go awry when Troy emerging from a coma, transforms into Archer and wreaks havoc upon his life, both at work and at home. As the bomb continues to tick and the tension mounts, it becomes a high stakes game of cat and mouse as both Archer and Troy, ironically trapped in their enemy's body, try to save face...their own(n)

programme.title: The Detonator
programme.desc: An undercover CIA agent attempting to thwart the sale of a nuclear weapon is forced to do battle with a dangerous horde of murderous arms dealers in this explosive action entry directed by Hong Kong veteran Po-Chih Leong and starring American action icon Wesley Snipes. Sonni Griffith (Snipes) is en route to Poland to expose a notorious arms dealer when the dealer is tipped off to the agent's identity and Griffith subsequently ends up in a prison cell. Soon released by the CIA with a mission to escort beautiful Russian Nadia (Silvia Colloca) back to the United States, Griffith quickly learns that the very same arms dealer he sought to wipe out is willing to kill for a valuable secret known only to his strong-willed charge. It seems that Nadia is the only one who knows the location of the hidden 30 million dollars that would allow Griffith's nemesis to purchase a nuclear bomb. Now with nothing to lose and everything to fight for, Griffith and Nadia must take on the world's most deadly arms dealer in order to save millions of lives(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: The Latvian ambassador to the UN is killed in a hotel lobby just as Sharona is checking in with Adrian - who naturally decides to investigate. Unfortunately, he is soon distracted by a fire-and-brimstone street preacher, whose sermons he begins compulsively emulating. Guest starring Jeffrey Dean Morgan (Grey's Anatomy) and Mykelti Williamson (24).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Van Pelt looks after a man who is willing to testify against a drug dealer, but her career is put in jeopardy when the witness is murdered. Jane learns the identity of the killer after questioning the victim's daughter, so the team rushes her to a safe house and waits for the hired gun to finish the job - only to be shocked by who appears. Crime drama, starring Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The team investigates when a struggling gold prospector is killed, but Lisbon is injured during the opening stages of the case and Hightower takes her place. The detectives speak to the man's family and become suspicious when they discover his girlfriend had bought a one-way ticket to San Francisco a week earlier. Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Aunjanue Ellis star.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team joins forces with a colonel to stop a terrorist who plans to use a biological attack on the nation's capital. Drama, starring Timothy Hutton and Christian Kane.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Sophie is suspected of stealing a rare painting, and Nate must not only help to clear her name but make sure he and his ex-partner Sterling find the real thief. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: US Marine sergeant Teddy Lemere is killed by a sniper in Afghanistan just after his sniffer dog helps guide a young child out of a minefield. Back in the US, his widow Ruby tells Gibbs and the team that she had recently received a message from her husband saying he might have upset a few people. Abby retrieves a tiny shard of the sniper's bullet from Ted's helmet and finds that it was made in America.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Agent LaRoche suspects Hightower of the murder of a police killer, who was burned to death in custody, after she reveals that she was sleeping with one of his victims. Jane also discovers that the head of CBI is linked to the death of an archaeology professor, prompting him to jeopardise his own career to help clear her name. Crime drama, starring Pruitt Taylor Vince and Aunjanue Ellis.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane believes a doctor's murderer was a fellow physician, and discovers the victim was the head of a transplant unit. He is convinced wealthy people are being given preferential treatment at the hospital where the medic worked, but his sleuthing lands him in trouble with a patient's gun-wielding bodyguard. Elsewhere, Lisbon is demoted following a slip of the tongue. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team attempts to sabotage the operation of a corrupt superstore owner who threatens a small town. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team prevents a businessman from ruining his company and destroying the town it supports. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New Mossad director Orli Elbaz asks for the team's help in finding Ilan Bodnar when one of her agents is shot dead in Virginia, telling Gibbs he was investigating several operatives who had gone rogue after Eli David's death. Ziva travels with Tony to Berlin in her pursuit of Bodnar, the man she believes was responsible for the death of her father. Guest starring Marina Sirtis (Star Trek: The Next Generation).(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Halloween arrives, and Peter joins forces with Joe to play a series of painful pranks on his friends and neighbours. Meanwhile, Brian teaches Stewie the basics of trick-or-treating, and Meg has high hopes for her first festively themed high-school party.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter receives tickets to a boxing match as a birthday gift, and ends up volunteering Lois to compete. To everyone's surprise, she proves to be a natural pugilist, prompting her hapless husband to become her fight promoter - little suspecting that she is using her marital frustrations as motivation in the ring.(n)

programme.desc: When Roger breaks his ankle, Francine convinces Stan to let him play in his basketball league.(n)

programme.desc: Stan discovers a valuable salt deposit beneath the Smiths' back garden, but when he tries to sell the mining rights, he discovers he signed them over to Steve years ago.(n)

programme.desc: Lois becomes a theatre director and decides to stage The King and I as her first production. However, Peter ends up taking over the show and replaces Loretta with Diane Simmons in the lead role.(n)

programme.desc: Francine is furious when she discovers that Stan has used government resources to artificially insert memories of happy vacations into the family's minds.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg is thrilled to make a new friend, unaware she is a member of a suicide cult. Peter inadvertently cancels Lois's plans for Stewie's first birthday party and has to go to great lengths to make alternative arrangements.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is placed under house arrest and fills his time by turning the basement into a bar - where Lois finds fame as the resident singer. programme.title: American Dad

programme.desc: Roger is rejected by Steve and seeks out another human companion - who soon becomes abusive, prompting Hayley to extricate him from the relationship. programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter teams up with Cleveland, Joe and Quagmire to win the coveted Golden Clam award for their Harvest Festival pageant float - but the prize comes between the old buddies. Meanwhile, Stewie is taken into care.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Grim Reaper turns up in Quahog to claim Peter, but suffers an injury that leaves him temporarily unable to reap any more souls - meaning everyone on Earth becomes immortal until he recovers.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: While testing a top-secret CIA surveillance device, Stan is shocked to discover his neighbours do not think very highly of him. In retaliation he evicts the whole neighbourhood so he can live free from criticism - but soon realises his mistake.(n)

Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.desc: The team travels into Oregon wine country to steal a rare bottle of vintage as part of the current con against the greedy owner of a winery. Drama, starring Timothy Hutton and Gina Bellman.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team creates a global toy craze to take on a CEO who is about to release a dangerous product onto the market. Drama, starring Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.desc: The team tracks Bodnar's SUV to a remote house in the countryside, but inside find only his dead accomplice - identified as a South African mercenary who helped Bodnar procure diamonds. Ziva and Tony, meanwhile, discharge themselves from hospital and wheedle information out of Abby to continue investigating on the quiet, having been warned by Homeland Security to stay off the case.(n)

Meanwhile, Richard Parsons from the Inspector General's office closes in on Ziva as he investigates the death of Ilan Bodnar, the man who killed her father. Guest starring Colin Hanks (Gus Grimly in the Fargo TV series).(n)

programme.title: Archer
