programme.title: The Pope of Greenwich Village
programme.desc: Two cousins who rob a Mafia safe and accidentally kill a cop, landing them in deep trouble with both the organised-crime bosses and the strong arm of the law(n)

programme.title: Dear Mr. Watterson: An Exploration of Calvin & Hobbes
programme.desc: A profile of Bill Watterson, the publicity-shy artist whose beloved comic strip "Calvin & Hobbes" influenced a younger generation of cartoonists. The filmmakers talk to several creative people who drew inspiration from the strip that ran from 1985 to 1995(n)

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee about an unspoken love that grows between a devoted butler and a gregarious housekeeper working in an estate in post-WWII Britain. A total of eight Academy Awards nominations for the film included Best Actor and Actress for Anthony Hopkins and Emma Thompson(n)

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: The examination of a mother-daughter relationship spanning 30 years. The story focuses on the tempestuous relationship between Aurora Greenway and her rebellious but devoted daughter, Emma. Against her mother's wishes, Emma marries a professor with limited potential and then adds insult to injury by making the age-conscious Aurora a grandmother three times over(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars as Marie Antoinette in Sofia Coppola's lively biopic which traces her life from teenage bride to doomed queen of France. With Jason Schwartzman(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: Hapless Hugh Grant hesitantly romances Andie MacDowell in this Brit comedy classic penned by Richard Curtis. Contains strong language and sexual scenes. (1994)(117 mins)(n)

programme.title: Fathers and Daughters
programme.desc: Jake is left to raise his daughter, Katie, on his own after his wife dies in a car accident and he suffers a mental breakdown. He struggles with daily routines and his relatives intend to take Katie away, but Jake knows that he has to hold on to the one thing that he loves the most - his daughter(n)

programme.title: Infinitely Polar Bear
programme.desc: Maya Forbes autobiographically inflected Infinitely Polar Bear stars Mark Ruffalo as Cameron, a man who suffers from bipolar disorder. After a breakdown forces him to leave his family and move into a halfway house, he attempts to rebuild a relationship with his two daughters, and win back the trust of his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana). When Maggie opts to go to business school in New York, they decide that he will move back in and take care of the day-to-day needs for the kids. Due to his mercurial nature, this leads to a series of quirky, funny, and sometimes frightening episodes. Infinitely Polar Bear screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: In this charmingly off-kilter family drama, siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialize in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars as Marie Antoinette in Sofia Coppola's lively biopic which traces her life from teenage bride to doomed queen of France. With Jason Schwartzman(n)

programme.title: The Eagle Huntress
programme.desc: This inspiring documentary profiles a 13-year-old Mongolian girl who strives to become the first female in her culture to learn to hunt alongside a trained eagle. As she prepares for an annual eagle-hunting competition, she must also deal with the disapproval of several tribal elders(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: Three sisters take their younger half sister under their wing after their estranged father passes away(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: In this Dogma 95-inspired first feature for acclaimed performers Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming, the two star as Joe and Sally Therrian, a couple who have recently reconciled after a yearlong separation, and who decide to throw a sixth anniversary party in their honor. They invite a bevy of Hollywood types, including Skye Davidson (Gwyneth Paltrow), a young, beautiful, Ecstasy-pushing actress appointed to play a character based on Sally in the new feature film based on Joe's successful novel. Also featured are Cal and Sophia Gold (played by real-life marrieds Kevin Kline and Phoebe Cates), the former a co-star of Sally's and the latter her best friend who has given up the business to raise a family; Mac (John C. Reilly), the director of the new film and his actress wife Clair (Jane Adams), who has continued working after the recent birth of their child; Judy and Jerry Adams (Parker Posey and John Benjamin Hickey), the Therrians' managers; and Gina (Jennifer Beals), Joe's ex-girlfriend, who is often regarded as his first big love. Things are complicated when their contentious neighbors (Mina Badie and Denis O'Hare) make an appearance, and a mystery gift causes the event to unravel over the course of one long evening. The film was also written by Cumming and Leigh, another first for both actors(n)

programme.title: 24 Hour Party People
programme.desc: Biography tracing the vibrant post-punk Manchester musical movement of the '70s, '80s and '90s through the eyes of TV personality and record magnate Tony Wilson(n)

programme.title: Down the Shore
programme.desc: The owner of a Jersey Shore amusement park is forced to confront his dark past when an enigmatic Frenchman shows up on his doorstep claiming to be his late sister's widowed husband(n)

programme.title: Woman on Top
programme.desc: Dishy restaurateur Isabella's motion sickness means she has to drive the car and make love on top, driving hapless husband Toninho to cheat on her. So she packs her bags and moves to San Francisco, for a new life as a star television chef in this piquant romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: A headstrong white-water rafting expert takes a holiday with her family, but their fun comes to an abrupt end when two killers show up. The fugitives' only escape route from the law is down a raging river, so they take her hostage as a guide. Meanwhile, the rest of her family tries to keep track of them from the riverbank in a desperate race to rescue her(n)

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: In 1960s China, a student from Beijing is sent to teach a nomadic tribe in Mongolia. While there, he cares for and adopts a wolf cub, and their bond causes him to see the world in a new light(n)

programme.title: Traitor
programme.desc: An FBI agent suspects a Muslim ex-US Special Operations officer of being involved with terrorists in this complex espionage thriller(n)

programme.title: The Children of Huang Shi
programme.desc: As China is ravaged by war in the late '30s, a young English journalist named George Hogg (Jonathan Rhys-Meyers) leads 60 orphans over the Liu Pan Shan mountains and into the safety of the Mongolian desert. Joining the journalist and the children on their arduous journey are an American nurse (Radha Mitchell) and the fearless leader of a Chinese partisan group (Chow Yun-Fat). The journey won't be easy, but as they boldly forge forward through snow-covered mountains and unforgiving desert, they learn the true meaning of responsibility, courage, and love. Jane Hawksley pens a drama based on actual events and directed by renowned filmmaker Roger Spottiswoode(n)

programme.title: The Anniversary Party
programme.desc: In this Dogma 95-inspired first feature for acclaimed performers Jennifer Jason Leigh and Alan Cumming, the two star as Joe and Sally Therrian, a couple who have recently reconciled after a yearlong separation, and who decide to throw a sixth anniversary party in their honor. They invite a bevy of Hollywood types, including Skye Davidson (Gwyneth Paltrow), a young, beautiful, Ecstasy-pushing actress appointed to play a character based on Sally in the new feature film based on Joe's successful novel. Also featured are Cal and Sophia Gold (played by real-life marrieds Kevin Kline and Phoebe Cates), the former a co-star of Sally's and the latter her best friend who has given up the business to raise a family; Mac (John C. Reilly), the director of the new film and his actress wife Clair (Jane Adams), who has continued working after the recent birth of their child; Judy and Jerry Adams (Parker Posey and John Benjamin Hickey), the Therrians' managers; and Gina (Jennifer Beals), Joe's ex-girlfriend, who is often regarded as his first big love. Things are complicated when their contentious neighbors (Mina Badie and Denis O'Hare) make an appearance, and a mystery gift causes the event to unravel over the course of one long evening. The film was also written by Cumming and Leigh, another first for both actors(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: Set in Victorian London, Tanya Wexler's period comedy Hysteria tells the tale of Mortimer Granville (Hugh Dancy), a young doctor disturbed by the way most hospitals ignore the latest research on germ theory, and still treat patients with bleedings and leeches. After being fired from his most recent job for speaking out on the matter, he ends up in the employ of Dr. Robert Dalrymple (Jonathan Pryce) who runs a private practice specializing in treating women who suffer from "hysteria" and come to the doctor for his precise digital manipulations in order to get a release. With the help of Mortimer's best friend Edmund (Rupert Everett) together they create a device that allows these women to achieve the desired result much more quickly. Complicating matters, Mortimer becomes enamored of Dalrymple's strong-willed, feminist-minded daughter Charlotte (Maggie Gyllenhaal). Hysteria played at the 2011 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Tip-offs to would-be journalist Sondra Pransky from beyond the grave improbably identify a serial killer stalking London as dashing aristocrat Peter Lyman. Aided by cynical magician Sid, Sondra strikes up a relationship with the suspect(n)

programme.title: Barton Fink
programme.desc: A playwright comes to Los Angeles to write heavyweight moral dramas. Instead, he gets lumbered with a wrestling picture. Drama/mystery(n)

programme.title: Clerks
programme.desc: A convenience-store worker, assigned to manage the Quick Stop market on his day off, tries his best at customer service. Meanwhile, his buddy working at video store looks on all of his customers with disdain(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: Buddy Ackerman is a corporate cutthroat who reigns over an entry level job anyone would kill for. The catch is, Buddy is the Boss from Hell! Ask Buddy's personal assistant, Guy, who is eager to climb the corporate ladder. On his first day, Guy quickly learns that no opportunity this promising comes without a cost(n)

programme.title: We'll Never Have Paris
programme.desc: In this charming romantic comedy, a man second-guesses his plans to propose to his girlfriend after a pretty coworker hits on him. When his girlfriend flees to Paris, he follows her in a last-ditch effort to salvage their relationship(n)

programme.title: Alpha and Omega
programme.desc: Two mismatched wolves embark on a cross-country quest to get back home and restore peace in their pack after being relocated thousands of miles away by well-meaning park rangers. Quick-witted Humphrey (voice of Justin Long) likes to frolic with friends and play video games with squirrels; disciplined Kate (voice of Hayden Panettiere) likes to call the shots and hunt caribou. Normally, an omega wolf like Humphrey would never stand a chance with an alpha wolf like Kate, but when they're both transported halfway across the country they must work together to get back to their natural habitat. And it won't be easy either, because the one thing Humphrey and Kate can agree on is that they don't have anything in common. Perhaps by working together toward a common goal, however, the two contentious traveling companions will finally realize that even lone wolves can use a helping paw every once in a while. Christina Ricci, Danny Glover, Dennis Hopper, and Larry Miller also supply voices for the Crest Animation production, helmed by Anthony Bell and Ben Gluck from a script by Chris Denk(n)

programme.title: Out to Sea
programme.desc: Walter Matthau and Jack Lemmon freshen up their Grumpy Old Men routine and head out to sea to let what's left of their hair down in this light-hearted comedy. Matthau is Charlie, an inveterate gambler who takes his brother-in-law on a cruise to escape his debts and with hopes of meeting some rich old ladies. The catch is, to avoid paying for the trip, Charlie has signed them up as dance hosts, even though he does not know his waltz from his tango(n)

programme.title: The Bronze
programme.desc: A former Olympic gymnast, still clinging to her fame as a bronze-medal winner, is forced to train an up-and-coming tumbler. However, she tries to sabotage the young athlete in order to preserve her own small-town celebrity in this wacky comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade in this wild horror comedy. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: An ex-con receives a message from God that he must head to Pakistan and bring Osama bin Laden to justice. However, his bizarre journey draws the attention of U.S. forces stationed in the Middle East, who are baffled and annoyed by his vigilante quest(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Bill Murray shines as an obnoxious weatherman who finds himself reliving the same 24-hour period(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy that follows the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his misfit clients as they attempt to fend off the takeover bid of a rival bodybuilding empire. To generate much-needed cash for the virtually bankrupt facility, the motley crew enter themselves in a national dodgeball tournament and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team made up of their foes. However, while the gym's unmotivated owner initially takes part only to appease his friends, he soon falls in love with the fast-paced sport - and the lawyer sent to oversee his finances!(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widow named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others in this charming comedy-drama: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: The best of the 'baby' movies of the late '80s, with Diane Keaton as New York advertising executive JC Wiatt, a career-minded yuppie who's far too busy to be bothered with raising a child - until she inherits a twelve-month-old girl named Elizabeth from her cousin! JC's regimented life is turned completely upside down, as she finds herself surrounded by nappies, baby food and an increasingly distant husband (Harold R(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger shows his lighter side in this jolly Yuletide comedy. He plays an overworked father who scrambles to find the perfect gift for his son on Christmas Eve. Desperate to make up for previous disappointments, he searches the city and battles frantic parents, a toy-crazed postal worker and a deviant Santa to find the elusive Turbo Man doll. Sinbad, Phil Hartman, Rita Wilson(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: Amanda Bynes ("Hairspray") stars as a tomboy college freshman who clashes with a wicked sorority queen and befriends seven dorky outcasts in this delightfully sassy teen twist on Snow White. Directed by Joe Nussbaum(n)

programme.title: Summer School
programme.desc: High school teacher Mark Harmon finds himself forced to teach English to a class of teenagers each with their own problem or hang-up. Crazy humour and some affecting drama ensues, although the best gags are reserved for Chainsaw and Dave, two horror film-loving teens obsessed with The Texas Chainsaw Massacre(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Summer Rental
programme.desc: A harried suburbanite gets into a number of misadventures during a family vacation that culminates in a boat race(n)

programme.title: Easy Money
programme.desc: Comedy about a larger-than-life, over-indulgent man who will inherit his own department store if he can abstain from life's excesses for twelve months(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widow named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others in this charming comedy-drama: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: They Call Me MISTER Tibbs!
programme.desc: A priest, a friend of a homicide detective, is a suspect in the murder of a prostitute since he was the last person seen with her(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Visually arresting drama of the afterlife starring Robin Williams as a man who dies and finds himself in a limitless world painted by his imagination. However, as soon as he begins to come to terms with his new condition, he discovers that existence, even in Heaven, can be heartbreaking. This sumptuous picture tackles heavyweight themes of love, life and death and uses its effects budget to create a memorable and compelling afterlife(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Best Actress nominee Julianne Moore stars in writer-director Todd Haynes' sumptuous homage to the melodramas of the 1950s. Moore is superb as an affluent wife and mother whose picture-perfect world is shattered by a shocking discovery about her husband (Dennis Quaid) and a forbidden love affair. Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson, James Rebhorn, Viola Davis(n)

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: Director Bill Duke steps behind the camera for this adaptation of the T.D. Jakes novel concerning a newly married couple that finds their union threatened by pressures involving faith, family, and finances. As the couple exchanges their vows, the minister lays a cord around them while uttering the blessing, "a threefold cord is not easily broken." Later, during their darkest hour, the minister's advice to always keep God at the center of their marriage could be the only thing that keeps this troubled pair together(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is the leader of a group of defiant soldiers plotting an elaborate escape from a German POW camp during WWII(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: One man's efforts to get ahead on the streets lead him into a life of danger in this hard-hitting urban drama from Roc-A-Fella Films, the production company run by top hip-hop artist Jay-Z. Beans (Beanie Sigel) is a member of a Philadelphia street gang who has had enough of his life of poverty. Determined to get ahead by any means available to him, Beans steps to the wrong side of the law and begins selling drugs. Forming a crew with his friends and fellow gangsters called the ABM ("All 'Bout the Money"), Beans and his partners soon become the new rulers of Philly's underground economy. But with success comes competition, and Untouchable J (Jay-Z) and Dame (Damon Dash), the leaders of an establish drug-dealing crew, decide the ABM are taking more than their share of the business, and begin retaliating with violence -- with both the ABM crew and Beans' wife as targets. State Property also stars Memphis Bleek, Omillio Sparks, and Sundy Carter(n)

programme.title: State Property 2
programme.desc: Hip-hop entrepreneur Damon Dash directs and costars in this explosive, action-packed gangsta saga. Real-life rapper Beanie Sigel stars as a Philly drug kingpin who plots to maintain control of his empire while he's in prison. Victor N.O.R.E. Santiago, Michael Bentt, Kenneth Johnson(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: When the Golden Child (J. L. Reate), a Tibetan holy figure, is kidnapped from a sacred temple by agents of the forces of evil, it is up to Los Angeles child finder Chandler Jarrell (Eddie Murphy) to rescue him(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Best Actress nominee Julianne Moore stars in writer-director Todd Haynes' sumptuous homage to the melodramas of the 1950s. Moore is superb as an affluent wife and mother whose picture-perfect world is shattered by a shocking discovery about her husband (Dennis Quaid) and a forbidden love affair. Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson, James Rebhorn, Viola Davis(n)

programme.title: Cry, the Beloved Country
programme.desc: Alan Paton's classic novel about two fathers coming to terms with personal loss and the emotional scars inflicted on South Africa during the era of apartheid was brought to the screen for a second time with this adaptation, the first major film produced in South Africa after Nelson Mandela's election ended mandatory white rule in that nation. Rev. Stephen Kumalo (James Earl Jones) is a minister from a poverty-stricken farming community who travels to Johannesburg for the first time in search of his son Absalom (Eric Miyeni), who moved to the city some time back and has gone missing. Kumalo regards the big city as a den of iniquity, and his low expectations are not betrayed; he is robbed and beaten shortly after he arrives, and when he visits his brother John (Charles S. Dutton), he discovers that Absalom has become a petty thief with a pregnant girlfriend, his sister Gertrude (Dambisa Kente) is a prostitute, and John has renounced his faith in God and advocates the violent overthrow of South Africa's white leadership. James Jarvis (Richard Harris) -- a wealthy white landowner from the same part of the country as Kumalo -- has also arrived in Johannesburg, also with sad personal business to attend to; his son, a well-liked activist for the rights of the city's black majority population, was killed during a robbery(n)

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Frank Military and Susan Rhinehart scripted this western, a look back at the post-Civil War Black cavalry troops known as the Buffalo Soldiers, the fierce fighting unit previously covered in a PBS four-parter (1970) and an NBC pilot (1979). In the New Mexico Territory, ex-slave Sgt. Wyatt (Danny Glover) and the Buffalo soldiers arrest Captain Draper (Robert Knott) and other Texas Rangers, but politics mean the Rangers are quietly freed later. Back at Fort Craig, Wyatt reports to anti-black General Pike (Tom Bower) and Col. Grierson (Bob Gunton), a white responsible for assembling and supporting the black regiment. A search is underway for Indian chief Victorio (Harrison Lowe). Indian prophet Nana (Chesley Wilson) is tortured in an effort to get him to reveal Victorio's whereabouts. Determining that Victorio is at Rattlesnake Springs, the Buffalo Soldiers head in that direction for a confrontation. Filmed in the desert of Arizona's Cochise County, Buffalo Soldiers premiered December 7, 1997 on TNT(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is the leader of a group of defiant soldiers plotting an elaborate escape from a German POW camp during WWII(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Expert, thrilling adaptation of John le Carré's best-selling novel exploring political corruption and pharmaceutical company malfeasance in Africa(n)

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: A suicidal teenager finds help and love in group-therapy sessions with other patients his own age(n)

programme.title: State Property
programme.desc: One man's efforts to get ahead on the streets lead him into a life of danger in this hard-hitting urban drama from Roc-A-Fella Films, the production company run by top hip-hop artist Jay-Z. Beans (Beanie Sigel) is a member of a Philadelphia street gang who has had enough of his life of poverty. Determined to get ahead by any means available to him, Beans steps to the wrong side of the law and begins selling drugs. But with success comes competition, and Untouchable J (Jay-Z) and Dame (Damon Dash), the leaders of an establish drug-dealing crew, decide the ABM are taking more than their share of the business, and begin retaliating with violence -- with both the ABM crew and Beans' wife as targets. State Property also stars Memphis Bleek, Omillio Sparks, and Sundy Carter(n)

programme.title: Nat King Cole: Afraid of the Dark
programme.desc: Documentary about crooner Nat King Cole. He was the only black TV star in Hollywood at a time when America groaned under the weight of racial segregation and prejudice, yet he possessed a natural talent so great that these issues were seemingly swept to one side to allow him to become one of the greatest jazz icons of all time. However, behind closed doors those around him were trying to think of a way to package him as something he was not: bi-white. This candid account of what really happened in and around his 'fairytale' life is taken from his private journals, interviews with his widow Maria and contributions from other family members, Tony Bennett, Buddy Greco, Harry Belafonte, Nancy Wilson, Sir Bruce Forsyth, George Benson, Aaron Neville, Johnny Mathis and many more. Featuring archive never seen before, it reveals Cole's feelings behind his ultimate calling as a 'beacon of hope' to the legions of the oppressed(n)

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Biyi Bandele's drama Half of a Yellow Sun stars Thandie Newton and Anika Noni Rose as twins born into a well-to-do Nigerian family. After completing their education overseas, each makes life choices that lead to a falling out between the once-close women. Eventually, the two sisters become embroiled in their home country's political unrest, which soon leads to civil war(n)

programme.title: The Scout
programme.desc: Al Percolo is the scout who'd do anything to sign a prospect. Unfortunately, things weren't going his way, and Al found his career heading south - all the way to Mexico - unitl he discovered Steve Nebraska, the greatest ball player who ever lived. Now, Al thinks he's back on top, and Steve believes he's found a new friend. And they're both about to discover how much they need each other(n)

programme.title: Tales From the Hood
programme.desc: In this anthology of inner-city horror stories, a mortician shares grisly tales about his "patrons" when a group of crooks show up at his funeral home looking for a stash of drugs(n)

programme.title: Red Hook Summer
programme.desc: In this affectionate slice of life, a boy from Atlanta spends a summer in Brooklyn under the watchful eye of his grandfather, a bishop at a local church, and he connects with a pretty girl who expands his understanding of the world(n)

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: Seventeen year old slacker Anton Tobias wakes up one Halloween morning to discover that both of his parents have been turned into two headless Halloween decorations(n)

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic future where emotions are illegal, a government enforcer seeks and destroys offenders. Derivative, Orwellian hodgepodge(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A Florida theme park has an unwelcome visitor: a Great White with a grudge. Tasty sequel (originally shown in 3D) with Dennis Quaid in for a short, shark shock(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Come
programme.desc: This familial comedy centers around the matriarch of an extended, dysfunctional family who reunite after the death of her husband, though it's apparent by everyone's reactions that the old man couldn't have died soon enough(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton(n)

programme.title: Step Up 2: The Streets
programme.desc: Director Jon M. Chu takes the helm for this Step Up sequel set at the Maryland School for the Arts and following the journey of a rebellious street dancer who struggles to fit in at the prestigious school. Andie (Briana Evigan) may show great promise as a dancer, but she just can't seem to let go of her old life and get a fresh start. With Baltimore's hottest underground dance contest looming on the horizon, Andie joins forces with top dancer Chase (Robert Hoffman) while simultaneously helping to sharpen the skills of her outcast classmates. Perhaps if Andie, Chase, and their talented team of misfit dancers can earn the top slot at The Streets, the troubled new arrival can finally make her dreams a reality while also letting go of the past, and bounding confidently forward into the future(n)

programme.title: dirtgirlworld
programme.desc: Scrapbox Racer. Animated series about dirtgirl and her friends, who live in a world full of bizarre insects, underground tunnels, vaudevillian trained chickens and performing stunt bugs. Scrapboy challenges dirtgirl to a race!(n)

programme.title: dirtgirlworld
programme.desc: Pollination. Animated series about dirtgirl and her friends, who live in a world full of bizarre insects, underground tunnels, vaudevillian trained chickens and performing stunt bugs. dirtgirl learns all about bees and ken gets his own miniature garden(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: An orphan who dreams of someday finding a family to call his own finds his fate taking an unexpected turn when a mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson transports him into the future. Based on the book A Day With Wilbur Robinson by William Joyce, Meet the Robinsons tells the story of a boy with a lifelong wish to belong, and shows what happens when he meets an incredible collection of characters who just might have the power to make his wildest fantasies come true. The film's all-star cast of vocal contributors -- including Angela Bassett, Kelly Ripa, Tom Selleck, Adam West, Steve Zahn, and Laurie Metcalf -- brings the world of the future to life as never before seen on the silver screen(n)

programme.desc: Paddington and the Cold Snap; Paddington and the Yeti; Paddington Hits the Jackpot. Paddington ends up flooding his neighbor's bathroom; Paddington sets out to prove the yeti's existence; and Paddington is a contestant on a game show where his skewed logic delights the audience(n)

programme.desc: The Shot Heard Round the World. Sarah and James both find themselves at Concord Bridge on April 19, 1775, when "the shot heard 'round the world" is fired and the Revolution begins. James (voice of Chris Lundquist) is covering the Minutemen for Ben Franklin's paper, while Sarah (Reo Jones) is following the British troops. Voice of Franklin: Walter Cronkite(n)

programme.desc: Gabriel Hogan, Richard Donat, and Ben Rose-Davis star in this drama about a young boy growing up in a coal mining community in Nova Scotia near the dawn of the 20th century. The boy learns many valuable lessons when he makes a new friend -- a wild horse captured and trained to work in the mines. The supporting cast includes Denny Doherty, best remembered as a member of the singing group The Mamas and the Papas(n)

programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. programme.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
programme.desc: Glee star Lea Michele slips on the ruby slippers for this animated 3D musical update of The Wizard of Oz, directed by Daniel St. Pierre and written by Adam Balsam, Randi Barnes, and Barry Glasser. Kansas has been devastated by tornadoes. Returning home to find the farm in ruins, young Dorothy is transported back to Oz, and embarks on a quest to save her old friends the Lion (Jim Belushi), the Scarecrow (Dan Aykroyd), and the Tin Man (Kelsey Grammer). Oliver Platt, Hugh Dancy, Megan Hilty, and Martin Short also contribute voices for an epic fantasy featuring music by Bryan Adams and Jim Vallance(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: If you could choose to live forever, would you? That's the thought-provoking question posed in Natalie Babbitt's famous novel, and this film based on it. The story centres round Winnie, a girl who lives in a very strict household where there's very little love or fun to be had. Then she discovers a mysterious family living in the grounds of the house, and falls in love with one of them. Jesse returns her affection, but then divulges his family's secret: they are immortals - people who will live forever since they drank from a magical spring. If Winnie wants to be with Jesse she must become immortal too. But there are lots of disadvantages - what will she choose? Teenage romance with a message in this touching family drama(n)

programme.title: Apocalypse L.A.
programme.desc: A group of friends try to flee for safety when deadly violence strikes Los Angeles after a meteor hits the city and leaves behind toxic smoke, which causes people to change into zombie-like creatures(n)

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: When the world is struck by extraordinary phenomena - Rome's Colosseum exploding, London's pigeons going berserk - it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting Earth's engine. But is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation? Jon Amiel's science-fiction blockbuster eschews outer space for inner-space in this taut special-effects extravaganza. Edited for language(n)

Later, Catherine's life is placed in jeopardy after visiting a nightclub with Nick, and Grissom finds a miniature replica of a crime scene he is investigating(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Built to Kill. In the second part of this two-parter Grissom investigates the murder of an aging rockstar who is found dead in his kitchen with an exact replica of the crime scene on the counter next to him. Meanwhile, Catherine probes her own abduction and learns that someone may be targeting her family(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Toe Tags. Five corpses tell their bloody tales to each other in the coroner's office cooler. In the first story, Catherine investigates the murder of a woman who is found nude in a hotel's service elevator. Next, Warrick probes the death of a hiker who apparently fell off a cliff. The strange thing is that her brain is missing. In the third tale, a former marine is stabbed to death at a gas station. Lastly, Grissom and Sara investigate the deaths of two men who were killed with a chainsaw(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Fannysmackin'. Two people are viciously beaten, one of them fatally, just five blocks apart in a shady part of town. As the CSIs investigate, more beatings are reported nearby, one of which is witnessed by Greg. His decision to intervene leads to extreme consequences. Later, another similar assault occurs in a different part of town and the CSIs must determine whether it is related to their cases or not. Cole: Kevin Federline(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Double-Cross. Grissom and Sara may be secret lovers, but they still find ways to surprise each other like when their religious beliefs surface when two nuns find a body of a woman crucified on a makeshift cross. The woman was found in a church where the priest may be a man of sin instead of a man of God(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Burn Out. The CSIs investigate the mysterious disappearance of two boys who live in close proximity to a known sex offender. Grissom must employ the help of the sex offender to gain an insight into a paedophile's mind and catch the kidnapper(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Post Mortem. The team struggles to identify the killer of an elderly cancer patient. And Greg faces past demons when he is brought to court for the murder of Demitrius James(n)

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
programme.desc: Happenstance. Twins who are unaware of each other's existence are murdered in different parts of town, and the CSIs must establish the connection - if any - between the killings(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: "In telling the story of my father, it's hard to separate fact from fiction. But that's the kind of story it is." So says William Bloom during the opening stages of Tim Burton's Big Fish. Bloom's father is Edward Bloom,an old codger who may be largely benign but is deemed a bullshitter by his son, and a selfish one at that. Edward's endless recounting of yarns about himself has distanced father and son. But when Edward is diagnosed with terminal cancer, William returns to the family home to try and make his peace, and find out who his father really is. Bed-bound, and with an audience of not just the cynical William but also his receptive wife Josephine, Edward recounts his remarkable life in fragments(n)

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: A knight and his brave apprentice battle a malevolent witch plotting war against mankind(n)

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: 19-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Dream House. A twist with the teams, and an assignment to create fairy tale characters. Elizabeth Mitchell guest judges(n)

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin star in Ruben Fleischer's very silly and gratuitously gory comedy, an everyday tale of strangers thrown together by the need to find sanctuary from flesh-eating hordes. The hordes in question were, until recently, human US citizens, but a global pandemic has transmogrified them into the shuffling, ravenous undead. Each of our heroic quartet is known only by the name of the town to which they're heading. Columbus, the movie's narrator, is a detail-obsessed introvert who has developed a seemingly endless checklist to avoid becoming a meal; Tallahassee is Columbus's polar opposite - rough and impetuous, he dispatches the undead with a gung-ho glee. After a tricky start, the duo team up and then let sisters Wichita and Little Rock join them. Their journey across the states takes in a Californian theme park and a visit to the home of a Hollywood star, but mainly it's an excuse for the four leads to off as many zombies as inventively, amusingly and bloodily as possible..(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: Dream House. A twist with the teams, and an assignment to create fairy tale characters. Elizabeth Mitchell guest judges(n)

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: Knockabout comedy set in the sexist world of 1970s newscasting. Ron Burgundy, San Diego's top-rated anchorman, reigns supreme in the all-male world of television news, until the arrival of an ambitious female reporter upsets the status quo. When she steps in to present the programme in Ron's absence, an uncivil war breaks out in the newsroom(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Six Feet Under. When Raymond discovers that he has shrunk a quarter of an inch, his impending mid-life crisis reaches fever pitch(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: The Wedding. In Part One of Everybody Loves Raymond's Season Two finale, a simple question from Ray (Ray Romano)--"Why did you marry me"--sends Debra (Patricia Heaton) flashing back some ten years to the events leading up to the Barones' marriage. Despite Ray's nervousness, the proposal comes off quite well. But as the Big Day approaches, Ray begins to wonder if Debra really loves him, or merely loves the idea of a "dream wedding." Fred Stoller makes his first series appearance as Ray's cousin Gerard(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: The Wedding. In the conclusion of a two-part story, Ray (Ray Romano) and Debra (Patricia Heaton) recall the events leading up to their wedding ten years ago. The Big Day arrives, but Ray can't shake the feeling that Debra doesn't really love him. Thus, he decides to give her one last chance to reconsider--or, as he puts it, "another chance to say no." When this final episode of Everybody Loves Raymond's second season was rerun by CBS during the summer of 1998, it was dedicated to the late Phil Leeds, who played the role of Uncle Mel; the dedication remains on all syndication prints, and in the DVD version(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Sleepless in Chicago. Jefferson learns that the doll he's bought for Marcy is worth a small fortune, so he asks Al to sleep next to Marcy while he trades dolls(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: No Pot to Pease In. Though Kelly (Christina Applegate) loses an audition for a sitcom role, the producer (George Wyner) is impressed by her impromptu description of the Bundy clan. As a result, the sitcom is rewritten to resemble a certain extremely popular Fox series about a dysfunctional family living in Chicago--and take a look at that cast! Inside jokes abound in this classic entry, including a pointed reference to housewife-activist Terry Rakolta, a swipe at the Fox network's low-power UHF affiliate lineup, and a clever amalgam of the names of series creators Ronald Leavitt and Michael G. Moye(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The Last One. Conclusion. In the gang's final farewell, Ross gives Rachel the best reason of all to stay in New York City, but can't keep the Bings from leaving that killer apartment after all these years. Ross: David Schwimmer. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Pilot Episode. The pilot episode of Friends has all of the main characters meeting at their favorite coffee shop, Central Perk. Spoiled trust fund girl Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) has left her fiancé at the alter; showing up at the cafe in her wedding dress, she asks old high-school buddy Monica (Courteney Cox) if she can stay with her. Monica, meanwhile, goes on the first of many bizarre and failed dates that she will endure throughout the series. Ross (David Schwimmer) appears perennially depressed about his ex-wife, who left him for another woman. They all make ironic fun of Spanish soap operas and Ross admits to his crush on Rachel -- setting into motion the major emotional pull of the first two seasons. A highlight is Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow) singing the first of many of what become her trademark silly songs: "Love is sweet as summer showers, love is a wondrous work of art; but your love, oh your love -- your love is like a giant pigeon crapping on my heart." This premiere episode originally aired on November 22, 1994(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Sonogram at the End

programme.title: Friends

programme.title: Married...With Children

With the help of neighbor Jefferson (Ted McGinley), Al is able to plead his case before the US Senate. Ironically, this episode was originally intended to air during Married. . .With Children's eighth season, but was postponed until Season Nine because of an ongoing Congressional probe of excessive violence on TV!(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.sub-title: The Naked and the Dead, but Mostly the Naked
programme.desc: The Naked and the Dead, but Mostly the Naked. Peg (Katey Sagal) and her lady friends decide to find out just what it is that attracts their husbands to "The Jiggly Room", a local nudie bar. Al (Ed O'Neill) is upset by Peg's intrusion upon his macho sanctum sanctorum, but is downright appalled when his wife decides to strut her own stuff on the Jiggly Room stage. Meanwhile, Kelly (Christina Applegate) may have trouble holding on to her latest commercial acting assignment for a weight-loss product(n)

programme.sub-title: Get the Dodge Out of Hell
programme.desc: Get the Dodge Out of Hell. En route to Wanker County, the Bundys take the Dodge to Traugott's Car Wash--where the old heap promptly disappears. This is unsettling enough, but it's nothing compared to the family's surprise when their former next-door neighbor Steve Rhodes (David Garrison) appears out of nowhere (Apparently it was a big surprise to the studio audience as well; when Steve comes into camera range, the spectators respond with longest sustained applause ever heard on the series!). Though advertised as Married. . .With Children's 200th episode, this is actually the 199th to be filmed; it was originally shown in tandem with The Best O' Bundy, a retrospective hosted by George Plimpton(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children

programme.desc: 25 Years and What Do You Get?. It's the Bundys' 25th anniversary, and Al (Ed O'Neill) celebrates the occasion by buying his wife Peggy (Katey Sagal) a diamond necklace--which is promptly buried in the backyard by family dog Buck. Meanwhile, Peg decides to give herself a little present by going to a luxurious spa, where she and Marcy (Amanda Bearse) are bowled over by a handsome attendant. Despite the Fox network's claims to the contrary, this is the 200th episode of Married. . .With Children(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Ship Happens. In the first episode of a two-part story, fabled deejay Wolfman Jack arrives at the Bundy home to inform Peg (Katey Sagal) that she has won a low-budget Caribbean cruise on the "Sea Dodge." In an instant, Peg and Al (Ed O'Neill) have boarded the luxury liner in the company of neighbors Marcy and Jefferson--while the luckless Wolfman Jack is left behind to look after the Bundy kids. The outcome of this episode is hinted at in the original Fox promotional copy, which promised "A Titanic Adventure."(n)

Dr. Andrew Copelan: Vondie Curtis Hall. ME Rodgers: Leslie Hendrix(n)

In order to keep the spirit in place, Jeric must first mummify Phoebe's body. However, an increasingly unstable Cole tries to save Phoebe from this fate by making a deal with the demon(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Importance of Being Phoebe. After kidnapping Phoebe, Cole sends a shapeshifter to assume her identity and help him manipulate Piper and Paige into giving him ownership of the manor, allowing him access to the powerful Nexus located beneath the house. As Phoebe plans her escape, Cole keeps her sisters distracted by getting Paige arrested and staging a series of unfortunate events at Piper's club(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Centennial Charmed. Cole casts a spell which causes Paige's existence to be wiped from her sisters' memories(n)

programme.desc: No Rest for the Wicked. In a battle to the death, Sam, Dean and Bob take on Lilith and all her demons in a last-ditch effort to save Dean's life. Season finale(n)

programme.desc: Lazarus Rising. As season four begins, Dean has been freed from hell and reunites with Sam and Bobby, but the three of them don't understand how he returned(n)

programme.sub-title: The Memories in the Shallow Grave
programme.desc: The Memories in the Shallow Grave. In the seventh-season premiere, the team investigate the death of a woman with a history of amnesia, disappearances and head trauma whose corpse is found in a shallow grave. Meanwhile, Booth and a very pregnant Brennan discuss their living arrangements once their baby is born(n)

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When a former member of the U.S. Army Special Forces returns to his small hometown in rural Washington State hoping to realise a childhood dream of working in the local lumber mill, he discovers that much has changed. The normally tranquil town is now besieged by drugs, outbreaks of violence and a general feeling of malaise and terror, with many pointing a finger at the influence of a crooked casino where his ex-girlfriend now works as a dancer(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II

programme.title: NBA Awards

programme.desc: Kingmaker. When an undercover policewoman is murdered, the team is charged with finding out how her cover was blown. Following a series of revelations, the investigation leads to a worker in a prominent congressman's office - but the suspect has a seemingly watertight alibi(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Hindsight. Det. Nick Falco (Michael Imperioli) finds himself being investigated by Fontana and Green after a woman is found slashed to death in his bathroom(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Public Service Homicide. Carl Mullaly turns up dead after a TV magazine show airs a story that portrays him as a sexual predator. Green and Cassady investigate the victim's neighbour, who is the father of an 8-year-old girl(n)

programme.title: Arrow
programme.desc: The Odyssey. A slick superhero drama executive-produced by Greg Berlanti, Marc Guggenheim, Andrew Kreisberg and David Nutter, whose hits between them include Smallville and Game of Thrones(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: House Call. The Charmed Ones summon a witch doctor (Richard Gant) to rid their manor of troublesome ghosts. Through a misunderstanding, the doctor concludes that the girls are bad witches, whereupon he places a hex on them, imbuing all three of them with potentially dangerous obsessions. The result: Paige (Rose McGowan) goes into "Fatal Attraction" mode to break up the engagement of her ex-boyfriend Glen (Jesse Woodrow) and his current sweetie, Jessica (Erin Bartlett); Piper (Holly Marie Combs) becomes the "neat freak" to end all neat freaks; and Phoebe (Alyssa Milano) is willing to commit mayhem to force her newspaper-columnist rival to treat her with respect(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Sand Francisco Dreamin'. A demon releases a dream dust which causes the sisters' nightmares to come to life(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Day the Magic Died. A heavily pregnant Piper develops high blood pressure. Victor brings his new wife Doris (guest star Cheryl Ladd) to meet his daughters. Phoebe and Paige attend a summit meeting with the leaders of evil when all magic - both benign and destructive - temporarily disappears from the world. However, they are unaware that Piper's unborn child is at risk of abduction by dark forces(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: In the Beginning. US drama about two brothers who hunt down and fight dangerous supernatural beings. Dean is sent back in time to 1973, and meets his parents when they were younger. He also encounters his grandfather, Samuel Campbell, and discovers that Campbell may have some answers about the Winchester family's link to the hunter community(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Metamorphosis. Sam and Dean encounter a man with a mysterious infection that transforms him into a flesh-eating monster(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Monster Movie. Several murders occur during an Oktoberfest celebration and it's learned a shape-shifting demon is responsible, and that it is taking the form of iconic movie monsters, such as a vampire, werewolf and mummy. The episode is presented in black and white(n)

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Yellow Fever. Several men die from fright after being infected with a mysterious illness that causes acute anxiety, which leads to total terror. Sam and Dean investigate, and Dean becomes infected. Sam desperately searches for a cure before Dean dies and is sent back to hell(n)

Meanwhile, Brennan's announcement about her baby irks Booth, and it challenges them to reconsider each other's perspective(n)
